# InnerGrove Yoga Website - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A Next.js-based website for innergrove.yoga featuring personal yoga story, information about yoga services, and contact information.

## Key Features
- Home page with hero section and key messaging
- About page with personal story and background
- Services/Classes page with yoga offerings
- Contact page with inquiry form
- Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
- SEO-friendly structure

## Tech Stack
- Next.js (App Router with TypeScript)
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- ESLint for code quality

## Development Workflow
1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Run development server: `npm run dev`
3. Build for production: `npm run build`
4. Start production server: `npm run start`

## Project Structure
- `app/`: Main application pages and layouts
- `components/`: Reusable React components
- `public/`: Static assets (images, fonts)
- `styles/`: Global CSS and Tailwind configuration

## Notes for Contributors
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow component composition patterns
- Ensure mobile-first responsive design
- Maintain consistent branding and color scheme
